title: amma unaiyE
sahitya:
ammA unnaiyE nambinEn parAshakti



anupallavi



immaghitalattinil illai vErOr tuNai



caraNam



kavalaik-kaDal kaDakkak-kappalum nIyE kaTTaTra karai

shErttuk-kAppavaLum nIyE

shavalaik-kuzhandai enait-tAnguvadun bhAram sharaN pughundiruppadE

sattiya vEda sAram
